item.description:
@billygotshot wrote:

very very simple…

instead of

  else if(!playerHasItemAmount(1436, 0)) {
    sendMessage("You do not have enough essence.");

use

else if(playerHasItemAmount(1436, 0)) { sendMessage("You do not have enough essence.");

item.title: I need help! i'll give you credit!
item.description:
@1080 wrote:

I will give credit to you when i make it

im working on a big runecrafting update

all i need to find out is how if they have no essence

item 1436

to make it say you do not have enough essence heres my current progress

[code]case 2478:

if(RCTimer == 0) {
if(playerLevel[20] >= 1) {
setAnimation(0x328);
sendMessage(“You craft runes.”);
addSkillXP(150, 20);
addItem(554, 1);
RCTimer = 10;
}
else if(playerLevel[20] < 1) {
sendMessage(“You need a runecraft level of 1 to craft runes.”);
}
else if(!playerHasItemAmount(1436, 0)) {
sendMessage(“You do not have enough essence.”);
}

}
break;[/code]

Read full topic
